mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cmcsyslogrecordeventlevel ( entityId, topCcmtsSyslogRecordType, topCcmtsSyslogMinEvtLvl ) VALUES ( #{entityId}, #{topCcmtsSyslogRecordType}, #{topCcmtsSyslogMinEvtLvl} )
INSERT INTO cmcsyslogrecordeventlevelII ( entityId, evPriority, evReporting ) VALUES ( #{entityId}, #{evPriority}, #{evReporting} )
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM cmcsyslogrecordeventlevel WHERE entityId = #{entityId} and topCcmtsSyslogRecordType = #{topCcmtsSyslogRecordType}
SELECT count(*) FROM cmcsyslogrecordeventlevelII WHERE entityId = #{entityId} and evPriority = #{evPriority}
mapper.update: UPDATE cmcsyslogrecordeventlevel SET topCcmtsSyslogMinEvtLvl = #{topCcmtsSyslogMinEvtLvl} WHERE entityId = #{entityId} and topCcmtsSyslogRecordType = #{topCcmtsSyslogRecordType}
UPDATE cmcsyslogrecordeventlevelII SET evReporting = #{evReporting} WHERE entityId = #{entityId} and evPriority = #{evPriority}
UPDATE cmcsyslogrecordeventlevel SET topCcmtsSyslogMinEvtLvl = '28' WHERE entityId = #{entityId}
mapper.select: select entityId, topCcmtsSyslogRecordType, topCcmtsSyslogMinEvtLvl from cmcsyslogrecordeventlevel where entityId = #{entityId}
select entityId, evPriority, evReporting from cmcsyslogrecordeventlevelII where entityId = #{entityId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cmcsyslogconfig ( entityId, topCcmtsSyslogSwitch, topCcmtsSyslogMaxnum, topCcmtsSyslogTrotInvl, topCcmtsSyslogTrotTrhd, topCcmtsSyslogTrotMode ) VALUES ( #{entityId}, #{topCcmtsSyslogSwitch}, #{topCcmtsSyslogMaxnum}, #{topCcmtsSyslogTrotInvl}, #{topCcmtsSyslogTrotTrhd}, #{topCcmtsSyslogTrotMode} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cmcSyslogConfig SET topCcmtsSyslogSwitch = #{topCcmtsSyslogSwitch}, topCcmtsSyslogMaxnum = #{topCcmtsSyslogMaxnum}, topCcmtsSyslogTrotInvl = #{topCcmtsSyslogTrotInvl}, topCcmtsSyslogTrotTrhd = #{topCcmtsSyslogTrotTrhd}, topCcmtsSyslogTrotMode = #{topCcmtsSyslogTrotMode} WHERE entityId = #{entityId}
mapper.select: select entityId, topCcmtsSyslogSwitch, topCcmtsSyslogMaxnum, topCcmtsSyslogTrotInvl, topCcmtsSyslogTrotTrhd, topCcmtsSyslogTrotMode from cmcsyslogconfig where entityId = #{entityId}
